extends java.lang.Object

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  OcAccountManager.OnDeleteListener
      An OnDeleteListener can be registered via the resource delete call.
      static interface  OcAccountManager.OnGetListener
      An OnGetListener can be registered via the resource get call.
      static interface  OcAccountManager.OnObserveListener
      An OnObserveListener can be registered via the resource observe call.
      static interface  OcAccountManager.OnPostListener
      An OnPostListener can be registered via the resource post call.

        Method for account registration to account server
        Parameters:
        authProvider - Provider name used for authentication.
        authCode - The authorization code obtained by using an authorization server as an intermediary between the client and resource owner.
        onPostListener - event handler The event handler will be invoked with a map of attribute name and values.

        OcException - if failure

        Parameters:

      • addPropertyValueToGroup

        public void addPropertyValueToGroup(java.lang.String groupId,
                                    OcRepresentation propertyValue,
                                    OcAccountManager.OnPostListener onPostListener)
                             throws OcException
        Method to add values for properties to the group on account server.
        Parameters:
        groupId - Group ID to add property values.
        propertyValue - OCRepresentation info that has pairs of property and value. Defined properties on the OCF spec are [members, masters, devices, resources, links] so far. (2016/10/19)
        onPostListener - event handler The event handler will be invoked with a map of attribute name and values.
        Throws:
        OcException - if failure

                                         OcRepresentation propertyValue,
                                         OcAccountManager.OnPostListener onPostListener)
                                  throws OcException
        Method to delete values for properties from the group on account server.
        Parameters:
        groupId - Group ID to add property values.
        propertyValue - OCRepresentation info that has pairs of property and value. Defined properties on the OCF spec are [members, masters, devices, resources, links] so far. (2016/10/19)
        onPostListener - event handler The event handler will be invoked with a map of attribute name and values.
        Throws:
        OcException - if failure

      • updatePropertyValueOnGroup

        public void updatePropertyValueOnGroup(java.lang.String groupId,
                                       OcRepresentation propertyValue,
                                       OcAccountManager.OnPostListener onPostListener)
                                throws OcException
        Method to update values for properties on the group on account server. It completely replaces existing values for specific properties.
        Parameters:
        groupId - Group ID to add property values.
        propertyValue - OCRepresentation info that has pairs of property and value. Defined properties on the OCF spec are [members, gname, owner, masters, devices, resources, latitude, longitude, radius, backgroundImage] so far. (2016/10/19)
        onPostListener - event handler The event handler will be invoked with a map of attribute name and values.
        Throws:
        OcException - if failure

      • observeGroup

        public void observeGroup(OcAccountManager.OnObserveListener onObserveListener)
                  throws OcException
        Method to register observe to group resource on account server. You can receive a notification when any value of property get changed in the group you joined.
        Parameters:
        onObserveListener - event handler The handler method will be invoked with a map of attribute name and values.
        Throws:
        OcException - if failure

      • cancelObserveGroup

        public void cancelObserveGroup()
                        throws OcException
        Method to cancel observe to group resource on account server.
        Throws:
        OcException - if failure

      • observeInvitation

        public void observeInvitation(OcAccountManager.OnObserveListener onObserveListener)
                       throws OcException
        Method to register observe to invitation resource on account server. You can receive a notification when you send or receive a invitation. Sending a invitation will be notified as 'invite' and Receiving will be as 'invited'. If you receive a invitation from other user, you should call 'replyToInvitation' to delete the invitation on account server, otherwise it will remain on the server.
        Parameters:
        onObserveListener - event handler The handler method will be invoked with a map of attribute name and values.
        Throws:
        OcException - if failure

      • cancelObserveInvitation

        public void cancelObserveInvitation()
                             throws OcException
        Method to cancel observe to invitation resource on account server
        Throws:
        OcException - if failure

      • sendInvitation

        public void sendInvitation(java.lang.String groupId,
                           java.lang.String userUuid,
                           OcAccountManager.OnPostListener onPostListener)
                    throws OcException
        Method to send a invitation to invite a user into a group.
        Parameters:
        groupId - Group ID for inviting.
        userUuid - Identifier of the user to invite.
        onPostListener - event handler The event handler will be invoked with a map of attribute name and values.
        Throws:
        OcException - if failure

      • cancelInvitation

        public void cancelInvitation(java.lang.String groupId,
                             java.lang.String userUuid,
                             OcAccountManager.OnDeleteListener onDeleteListener)
                      throws OcException
        Method to cancel a invitation on account server you has sent before the invited user replies.
        Parameters:
        groupId - Group ID to cancel a invitation.
        userUuid - Identifier of the user to cancel a invitation.
        onDeleteListener - event handler The event handler will have headerOptionList.
        Throws:
        OcException - if failure

      • replyToInvitation

        public void replyToInvitation(java.lang.String groupId,
                              boolean accept,
                              OcAccountManager.OnDeleteListener onDeleteListener)
                       throws OcException
        Method to reply to the invitation that you has received. If you set accept as true, you will join the group as a member and the invitation will be deleted on account server. If false, only the invitation will be deleted.
        Parameters:
        groupId - Group ID to delete a invitation.
        accept - boolean whether to join the group or not.
        onDeleteListener - event handler The event handler will have headerOptionList.
        Throws:
        OcException - if failure
